Introduction

YooYeon is a South Korean singer and actress under MODHAUS.

On September 8, 2021, YooYeon was featured on the trailer for MBC's survival show "My Teenage Girl". She was disqualified from the competition in the first episode after receiving 1 out of 4 vote from the masters. She was brought back in the third episode by mentor Jeon Soyeon. YooYeon was eliminated in the final episode of the show after ranking 8th.

On July 11, 2022, YooYeon was introduced as the fifth member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS. She first debuted with the sub-unit Acid Angel from Asia on October 28, 2022 with the mini album "ACCESS". tripleS made their debut with the first ten members (thus including YooYeon) on February 13, 2023 with the mini album "ASSEMBLE".

As a member of tripleS, YooYeon was placed in the sub-units Acid Angel from Asia, ACID EYES, EVOLution, Visionary Vision, and Hatchi!.

On April 7, 2024, YooYeon made her acting debut in the web drama "What's Up".
